Package towersim.tasks

Class Task

  • Object
    • Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Encodable
    public class Task
extends Object
implements Encodable
    Represents a task currently assigned to an aircraft.

    Tasks relate to an aircraft's movement and ground operations.

    Partially implemented in assignment 1, to be completed in assignment 2

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Task​(TaskType type)
      Creates a new Task of the given task type.
      Task​(TaskType type, int loadPercent)
      Creates a new Task of the given task type and stores the given load percentage in the task.

        public Task​(TaskType type)

        Implemented in assignment 1

      • Task

        public Task​(TaskType type,
            int loadPercent)
        Creates a new Task of the given task type and stores the given load percentage in the task.

        This constructor is used for tasks of the LOAD type, so that a percentage may be specified for the load operation.

        Parameters:
        type - type of task
        loadPercent - percentage of maximum capacity to load
        Implemented in assignment 1

    • Method Detail

        Returns the type of this task.
        Returns:
        task type
        Implemented in assignment 1

      • getLoadPercent

        public int getLoadPercent()
        Returns the load percentage specified when constructing the task, or 0 if none was specified.
        Returns:
        task load percentage
        Implemented in assignment 1

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns the human-readable string representation of this task.

        The format of the string to return is:

        • "LOAD at percent%" where percent is the load percentage, without the enclosing double quotes, if the task type is LOAD.
        • "taskType" where taskType is the string representation of the task type, without the enclosing double quotes, for any other task type.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        string representation of this task
        Implemented in assignment 1

      • encode

        public String encode()
        Returns the machine-readable string representation of this task.

        If this is a LOAD-type task, the format of the string to return is 

        LOAD@loadPercent
        where loadPercent is the task's load percentage.

        If this is not a LOAD-type task, the format of the string to return is 

        TASKTYPE
        where TASKTYPE is the name of the task's task type (see Enum.name()).

        For example: 

        LOAD@20
        For example: 
        WAIT
        Specified by:
        encode in interface Encodable
        Returns:
        encoded string representation of this task
        Implement this for assignment 2

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(Object obj)
        Returns true if and only if this task is equal to the other given task.

        For two tasks to be equal, they must have the same task type and load percentage.

        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Parameters:
        obj - other object to check equality
        Returns:
        true if equal, false otherwise
        Implement this for assignment 2

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Returns the hash code of this task.

        Two tasks that are equal according to equals(Object) should have the same hash code.

        Overrides:
        hashCode in class Object
        Returns:
        hash code of this task
        Implement this for assignment 2
